title: abc2svg integration model
description: This describes the structures provided by abc2svg ABCJson.json()

type.title: The Type Schema
type.description: The voice element type as specified in #/properties/music_type_ids

dur.title: The Dur Schema
dur.description: The duration of the voice element

istart.title: The Istart Schema
istart.description: the start position of the voice element in abc

iend.title: The Iend Schema
iend.description: the end position of the voice element in abc

music_types.title: The Music_types Schema
music_types.description: This provides a lookuptable to map internal nmerical values to strings. the internal numer corresponds to the array index

items.title: The Items Schema
items.description: A particular name of a voice element type

bar.title: The Bar Schema
bar.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

clef.title: The Clef Schema
clef.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

custos.title: The Custos Schema
custos.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

grace.title: The Grace Schema
grace.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

key.title: The Key Schema
key.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

meter.title: The Meter Schema
meter.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

Zrest.title: The Zrest Schema
Zrest.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

note.title: The Note Schema
note.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

part.title: The Part Schema
part.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

rest.title: The Rest Schema
rest.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

yspace.title: The Yspace Schema
yspace.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

staves.title: The Staves Schema
staves.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

Break.title: The Break Schema
Break.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

tempo.title: The Tempo Schema
tempo.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

block.title: The Block Schema
block.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

remark.title: The Remark Schema
remark.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

info.title: The Info Schema
info.description: this represents the literal content of info lines in the abc header. Note that multiple lines are joined with \n

X.title: The X Schema
X.description: the content of X: for tune id

F.title: The F Schema
F.description: the content of F: for filename

T.title: The T Schema
T.description: the content of T: for title

C.title: The C Schema
C.description: the content of C: used for copyright owner

S.title: The S Schema
S.description: the content of S: for source

M.title: The M Schema
M.description: the content of M: for measure

W.title: The W Schema
W.description: the content of W: lines for wording

voices.title: The Voices Schema
voices.description: This represents the voices in the tune

items.title: The Items Schema
items.description: This represents one particular voice in the tune

voice_properties.title: The Voice_properties Schema
voice_properties.description: Ths represents the properties of the given voice

id.title: The Id Schema
id.description: This is the ide of the voice as specified in the V: header

time.description: This is the time of the last note of this voice

key.title: The Key Schema
key.description: this denotes the initial key signature of the tune

type.description: The voice element type as specified in #/properties/music_type_ids

dur.title: The Dur Schema
dur.description: The duration of the voice element

istart.title: The Istart Schema
istart.description: the start position of the voice element in abc

iend.title: The Iend Schema
iend.description: the end position of the voice element in abc
